trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting" />, event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> enable you to specify the behavior of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> permiten especificar el comportamiento de una manipulación.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> to do the following:
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> para hacer lo siguiente:

trans-unit.source: Specify that the position should be relative to an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que la posición debe ser relativa a un elemento estableciendo el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Specify whether single-finger manipulation are enabled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.IsSingleTouchEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Especificar si se habilitan manipulación de un solo dedo estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.IsSingleTouchEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Mode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Especificar qué tipos de manipulación están habilitados estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Mode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad a un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Especificar el centro de rotación de un solo dedo estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Cancel the manipulation by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Cancele la manipulación estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las manipulaciones, vea el [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de una aplicación que responde a manipulaciones, vea [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Cancels the manipulation and promotes touch to mouse events.
<see langword="true" /> if touch was successfully promoted to mouse events, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
If the method succeeds, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> sends previous touch down events as mouse down events and future manipulation events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: Si el método se realiza correctamente, el valor predeterminado <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> envía anterior touch eventos como eventos mouse down y no se producen eventos de manipulación futuras.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether one finger can start a manipulation.
<see langword="true" /> one finger can start a manipulation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> puede iniciar una manipulación; solo dedo en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las manipulaciones, vea el [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de una aplicación que responde a manipulaciones, vea [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.
The container that all manipulation events and calculations are relative to.
trans-unit.target: El contenedor que se relacionan todos los cálculos y eventos de manipulación.

trans-unit.source: The default is the element on which the event occurred.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es el elemento en el que se produjo el evento.

trans-unit.source: You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede especificar que la posición debe ser relativa a otro elemento estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can make the manipulation positions relative to the parent of the element that receives the manipulation events.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede hacer las posiciones de manipulación en relación con el elemento primario del elemento que recibe los eventos de manipulación.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> event handler is the only place in which you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> controlador de eventos es el único lugar en el que puede establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.ManipulationContainer%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las manipulaciones, vea el [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de una aplicación que responde a manipulaciones, vea [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Una colección de objetos que representa los contactos táctiles para la manipulación.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which types of manipulations are possible.
One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los valores de enumeración.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes.All" />.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes.All" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las manipulaciones, vea el [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de una aplicación que responde a manipulaciones, vea [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value other than one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationModes" /> enumerations value
Gets or sets an object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.
An object that describes the pivot for a single-point manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que describe el pivote para una manipulación de punto único.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A> property, the manipulation will contain rotation data when the user uses one finger during a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A> propiedad, la manipulación contendrá datos de rotación cuando el usuario usa un solo dedo durante una manipulación.

trans-unit.source: This is to simulate real-world situations where you can use one finger to rotate an object, such as a piece of paper on a table.
trans-unit.target: Esto sirve para simular situaciones del mundo real que puede usar un solo dedo para girar un objeto, como una hoja de papel en una tabla.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A> is `null`, the user must use two fingers to cause rotation.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A> es `null`, el usuario debe usar dos dedos para hacer la rotación.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de las manipulaciones, vea el [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo de una aplicación que responde a manipulaciones, vea [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> event and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra un controlador de eventos para el <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationStarting> eventos y establece el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs.Pivot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To test this example, follow the steps in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) and replace the code in step 4 with this code.
trans-unit.target: Para probar este ejemplo, siga los pasos de [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md) y reemplace el código en el paso 4 con este código.

trans-unit.source: The parameter to add.
Adds parameters to the current manipulation of the specified element.
You typically do not need to call this method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, es necesario llamar a este método.

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilice las propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartingEventArgs> en su lugar.
